mapper.select: SELECT h.hName, h.address1, newT.hcount, newT.price, h.locCode, h.hotelCode , nf.saveFilename, newT.roomCode FROM hotelInfo h LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT hotelCode, hcount, max(price) as price, max(roomCode) as roomCode FROM roomInfo GROUP BY hotelCode, hcount ) newT ON newT.hotelCode=h.hotelCode LEFT OUTER JOIN( select roomcode, saveFilename FROM roomfile WHERE fileCode=(SELECT MAX(fileCode) FROM roomfile) )nf ON nf.roomCode=newT.roomCode WHERE h.hotelCode=#{hotelCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HREVIEW(HotelCode, ReviewNum, content, userIdx, star) VALUES (#{hotelCode}, hReview_seq.NEXTVAL, #{content}, #{userIdx}, #{star})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM HREVIEW WHERE hotelCode=#{hotelCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISHLISTCODE_DH(wishCode, userIdx, productCode, amount, price, hotelCode) VALUES(WISHCODE_DH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userIdx} , #{roomCode}, 1, #{price}, #{hotelCode})
